titles.title: To amend the charter of Southeastern University of the District of Columbia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on District of Columbia.

Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held by the Subcommittee on District of Columbia; Forwarded by the Subcommittee to the Full Committee Prior to Introduction and Referral (June 26, 2001).
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Mrs. Morella moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2061.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Committee on Governmental Affairs referred to Subcommittee on Oversight of Government Management, Restructuring and the District of Columbia.

calendar.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Lieberman without amendment. With written report No. 107-102.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 245.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.subcommittee: Oversight of Government Management, the Federal Workforce, and the District of Columbia
committee.name: Senate Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 9/20/2001--Passed House without amendment. Amends the Federal charter of Southeastern University of the District of Columbia with respect to its Board of Trustees.
